properties.title: ConvLSTM rainfall nowcasting model - Keras (PyTorch backend)
properties.description: Trained ConvLSTM model using Keras 3 with PyTorch backend. Developed as part of the master's thesis on model interoperability. Architecture based on Demetrakopoulos et al. (2023).
properties.training_data: Radar precipitation dataset from Demetrakopoulos 2023, via KNMI API (https://github.com/petrosDemetrakopoulos/LSTM-radar-precipitation-forecast)
